en.hello:
ğŸ‘‹ Hello there! I'm your friendly anonymous chat bot.
Let's make new connections!
Use /next to find a chat partner

/stop - end conversation gracefully
/help - get assistance
en.helpText:
â„¹ï¸ Here's how I can help you:
/start - Begin our journey
/help - See this helpful guide
/next - Find a wonderful chat partner
/stop - Finish current chat politely
/report - Report inappropriate behavior
/stats - Bot statistics
